name: Crazy City Taxi Car Driver 3D
description:
Play the crazy city taxi car driver 3D because is here now for you. Be ready to rock out the new 3D crazy taxi world full of Crazy City Taxi Car Driver 3D city rush adventure, Extreme Traffic Rush and want to become the crazy best Crazy City Taxi Car Driver 3D in new york city rush traffic. An extreme crazy taxi city rush is safe auto driver for girls who love pink taxi. It is a power simulation game because it gives you chance to pick up crazy city taxi car driving 3d. Be a competitor As a responsible driver it’s your duty or job to pick up passengers and drop them on their desired destination or stations like crazy taxi fish. Show your super driving skills drop them on time and park your car on exact parking point because it is crazy city taxi car driver 3D. Crazy taxi race! Extreme city rush roads is full of rush roads. Go wild with your money unlock new vehicles like Super Taxi.
Drive crazy taxi rush in an epic city has most wanted car controls. Be a public transporter dr.
crazy city taxi car driver 3D provides you this chance to go on beaches enjoy blue whale swimming in sea. You can drive crazy taxi stunts, Crazy City Taxi Car Driver 3D enjoy crazy taxi club 3d, beach Taxi, and School Bus Taxi. Obey the traffic rules and signals on roads. As a human being it’s difficult to remember all the Traffic Roads Signs and stations but an arrow indicator will help you to explore more roads and new ways. It’s your life so rule it with your rules it should be your life your rules.
Features
- Amazing 3D city.
- Enhance Your Driving Skills.
- Speedy cabs.
- Paid game available on app store.
